markdownRemark.html: This English academy offers high quality English courses. Their professors are professionals, highly experienced and committed to a very personalized attention to detail. Founded almost forty years ago, the academy is one of the most experienced in Marbella. They offer English courses to students of all ages. The centre and Angelas School both help prepare children to enter international schools on the Costa del Sol. English classes available for adults.

frontmatter.title: Marbella Study Centre

frontmatter.address: Avda. Gral. López Domínguez 5 Ed. Bruselas - Bajos, 29603 Marbella, Málaga
